4. Metadata: Are you generating metadata with your FEG-EPMA, LA-ICP-MS, Raman spectroscopy measurements? 
6. Preservation: Please note that while FWO request storage of all data for 5 years, the KU Leuven policy asks for 10 years of preservation of all relevant data i.e. data underlying publications and those that are difficult to reproduce 
7. Are there any domain specific repositories in your field that you can use for data sharing? If not you can use KU Leuven RDR: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
